name: The Impossible Ball Game
description:
Well as the title explains, it is a very damn hard game, in the game you are a red ball who is trying to escape from the white / black place throught obstacles, this game will make you break your desk and rage guit (happened to me while developing it) this is game is made with brackeys tutorial (How to make a video game), this is also my first game ever, ENJOY!

-- The game is very simple as this is my first time ever coding / programming in anyway!

-- if i could complete this post the video on youtube and post it with #redball4life

-- i´ll check all the videos!
